statements: SELECT * FROM language_learning_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT language, progress FROM language_learning_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, language, last_updated FROM language_learning_progress ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_learning_progress WHERE progress BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT language, COUNT(*) AS total_progress FROM language_learning_progress GROUP BY language;
SELECT * FROM language_learning_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, language, MAX(progress) AS max_progress FROM language_learning_progress GROUP BY user_id, language HAVING MAX(progress) > 70;
SELECT language, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM language_learning_progress GROUP BY language ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_learning_progress WHERE language = 'Spanish' AND progress < 40;
SELECT user_id, language, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM language_learning_progress GROUP BY user_id, language ORDER BY user_id ASC, avg_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_language_progress;
SELECT user_id, language FROM digital_nomads_language_progress ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT user_id FROM digital_nomads_language_progress WHERE progress > 50;

SELECT * FROM language_learning_progress WHERE level > 3 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT user_id, language, COUNT(*) AS total_words FROM vocabulary_lists GROUP BY user_id, language HAVING total_words > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT country, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM cultural_insights GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_users DESC;

SELECT user_id, language, level, progress_percentage FROM language_learning_progress WHERE progress_percentage BETWEEN 50 AND 80 ORDER BY level ASC, progress_percentage DESC;

SELECT user_id, language, last_practice_date FROM language_learning_progress WHERE learning_level > 3 ORDER BY last_practice_date DESC;
